title: How to Make Orange Blossom Snowballs

steps.headline: Beat the eggs and sugar together until combined.
Add the oil to the egg and sugar mixture.
steps.description: Mix. Then add the flour and baking powder and mix well until a smooth dough forms.

steps.headline: Prepare the baking tray or sheet by covering with baking or parchment paper.
Roll the dough into small balls about the size of a teaspoon.
steps.description: Arrange on the baking tray or sheet.

steps.headline: Mix the orange blossom water into the apricot jam.
Roll each ball in the apricot and orange blossom mixture.
Roll the jam covered balls in the coconut to coat.
steps.description: The orange blossom snowballs are now ready to serve.

text: Beat the eggs and sugar together until combined.  Add the oil to the egg and sugar mixture. Mix. Then add the flour and baking powder and mix well until a smooth dough forms. Prepare the baking tray or sheet by covering with baking or parchment paper.  Roll the dough into small balls about the size of a teaspoon. Arrange on the baking tray or sheet. Place into the oven at 180ºC/350ºF. Cook for 10 minutes. Remove from the heat.  Mix the orange blossom water into the apricot jam.  Roll each ball in the apricot and orange blossom mixture.  Roll the jam covered balls in the coconut to coat. The orange blossom snowballs are now ready to serve. Finished.
